title: Assinatura digital de email
content:
Estou tentando usar meu certificado ICP Brasil A3 para assinar os emails digitalmente pelo Thunderbird, mas quando tento selecionar na parte "S/MIME - Certificado pessoal de assinatura digital" aparece o erro "O gerenciador de certificados não encontrou um certificado válido que possa ser usado para assinar digitalmente suas mensagens do endereço <meuemail@meudominio.com>

Alguém sabe alguma maneira de usar o A3 para assinar via Thunderbird?
creator: g.luigi2000

title: Hyperlinked text does not past into  Tunderbird email.
content: Hyperlinked text does not paste into Thunderbird email. Only the text pastes in. The hyperlinks do not. If I paste in text that has several hyperlinks already embedded only the text pastes in. The hyperlinks are lost. I must paste the hyperlinked text with the URLs. How do I do this. All searches are irrelevant. I know hot to insert URL into new text but that is not the issue. My text to be pasted already has many hyperlinks in the text and I do not want to laboriousness do them all again. When I paste in a paragraph of test that already has several hyperlinks I want that ALL to past in. How to I do this?
creator: jpjrsf

title: Change Day Start and End Times
content:
Hello,

I'm kicking the tires on this and the biggest obstacle for me right now is that when I view the calendar in a week view, the day starts at midnight. I would like to hide midnight to 6am.

I followed these steps, that did not work:

1. Navigate to the hamburger menu in the upper right corner. 2. Select settings. 3. In the calendar tab, I changed day starts to 6am, and day ends to 9pm.

There is no way to save this, so I assume it just works. However, when I navigate back to the calendar, nothing has changed. The day still starts at midnight.

Am I possibly looking in the wrong place? Is there a way to customize this as I've described?

Thanks for any help.
creator: erinlowell1965

title: All mails in T-Online account deleted
content:
Hi everyone,

I have a problem with my T-Online account.

Thunderbird ESR 115.11.0

Windows 11

IMAP

As soon as I open Thunderbird, all 8400 mails in the account are deleted.

Only the mails from yesterday and today are still there. The account also works - sending and receiving.

Other accounts (Gmail and Strato ) are ok.

Have copied an offline backup of the account to TB - as soon as I go online the mails are deleted again.

Copying and moving the mails offline to a local folder does not work either.

TB first tries to establish a connection to the server - which of course doesn't work offline.

Would hate to reinstall as there are a lot of local folders.

I'm at a bit of a loss - thanks for your help
creator: peter.wackerbauer

title: Thunderbird spontaneously creates thousands of duplicate emails
content: I am currently using T-Bird 115.11 on Windows 10. Not that it matters much, because I have had this problem continually for years with various editions of Thunderbird on Win7 as well. Often when I open Thunderbird, I discover it has created hundreds and even thousands (today 65,000) duplicates of emails in various mailboxes. This has nothing to do with downloading. The emails in question were downloaded weeks or even months ago, and I havev't accessed them. Another problem is that Thunderbird creates emails dated in 1970, even before anyone thought of the internet, let alone PCs or emails. Why is this happening? How can I prevent it?
creator: Richard8409

title: Dealeate FUnction
content: My delate function for Emails disappeared. How can I install again?
creator: kellerhals.katharina

title: .eml file display error from sftp
content:
Hello, I recently installed Ubuntu 24.04 with the version of Thunderbird (115.10.1) supplied with the distribution. I can no longer display mail saved as .eml in a remote folder (sftp). Thunderbird opens, but the mail window is empty. If I ask for the source code, this message appears:

Unable to read file at address view-source:file:///run/user/1000/kio-fuse-ouSeRu/sftp/myuser@myserver/mymessage.eml?type=application/x-message-display.

If I open from CLI I get this message :

JavaScript error: chrome://messenger/content/aboutMessage.js, line 218: NS_ERROR_FILE_ACCESS_DENIED: Component returned failure code: 0x80520015 (NS_ERROR_FILE_ACCESS_DENIED) [nsIMsgDBHdr.mime2DecodedSubject]

If I open the save file with a file editor I'm able to see the source code.

Could you please help me? Thanks
creator: rome.fr

title: allegati non visibili su posta certificata pec
content: Buongiorno, da un po' di tempo ho notato che non trovo più gli allegati nelle email di posta certificata pec. Non si vede nemmeno la graffetta che indica la presenza di un allegato. Riesco a vedere che c'è un allegato solo se faccio inoltra, allora nella bozza trovo gli allegati. Grazie Igor
creator: info10071

title: Latest version
content:
Good news For some months now, I have stayed on a much earlier version of 115. Today I updated to the latest available... no issues arising so I happily conclude that Tbird is stable.

Thanks to all who are working on making this a great product.
creator: RonSH

title: Duplikování zpráv v archivu
content:
Dobrý den,

chtěl bych se zeptat, jestli nevíte, proč se maily duplikují po přesunutí do archivu do lokální složky v počítači. Mám maily uložené v archivu po letech a tento problém se vyskytuje jen u roku 2024. V příloze zasílám fotku z archivu. Když jsem maily do archivu přesouval, byl vždy jen jeden mail, nyní jich je v archivu totožných 8.

Děkuji za radu
creator: THANZLIK

title: Merging contects in Address Book
content: TB 115.8.0.1, Mac OS Sonoma 14.5 Over the years my Address Book has acquired many separate entries for the same individual, with two or more (obsolete) email addresses, for example. Also, one with email address only, and another with phone number, plus various pieces of contact data in one or both cards. If there is a way to compare, choose correct data, and combine contact files, I can't find it. If not, I'd like to propose an enhancement. Thank you.
creator: hmkabaker

title: https added to a link in email even if it is already there
content: Several times lately I click on an email from cnet and it will not load. The reason is when Thunderbird passes the link to Firefox there is an extra https// added to the beginning: https//https//cnet... . Not all email links from cnet start with https//, but when they do I must manually delete the first one (in Firefox). Not sure which program, Thunderbird or Firefox, is causing the problem, but it is annoying.
creator: jjmartin

title: Увеличить место для получения писем на почте
content: Прошу увеличить вместимость почты для получения и хранения писем. Не хватает места.
creator: olga.hrapova

title: Thunderbird not downloading messages
content:
When I try to download messages on one of several POP3 accounts I get the error message Unable to write the email to the mailbox. Make sure the file system allows you write privileges, and you have enough disk space to copy the mailbox. and it keeps downloading the last message I received before the problem started.

I have tried repairing the folder, clearing cache and even turning off my anti-virus for Thunderbird but to no avail. No problems on my other accounts

Regards Graham
creator: GrahamMills

[InstallD78BF5DD33499EC2] Default=Profiles/ok2vg7oz.default-esr Locked=1

[Profile0] Name=default-esr IsRelative=1 Path=Profiles/ok2vg7oz.default-esr

[General] StartWithLastProfile=1 Version=2

title: All folders are now empty
content: Hello, I own and operate my own business in the automotive repair sector however my direct computer knowledge is not sufficient in many cases. My issue is that my Gmail and Thunderbird is linked to send messages to my clients for estimate purposes. Incoming mail to Gmail as well as outgoing from Gmail gets copied into Thunderbird. Assuming that Thunderbird had so many emails on the screen I asked the internet on how to do a mass email delete. Now I assume "that" is the reason why all my labels/folders are now empty I can both Gmail and Thunderbird? These folders held important invoices, contact information and just important information for me to go back into should a situation require it. How do I recover all of my deleted messages in Thunderbird? Will this repopulate the folders with my missing information?? The individual who set it up for me is an expert in the field however I am unable to make any contact with him. He's not responding to any of my messages or calls. Please help. Now please remember I am very ignorant when it comes to this type of experience. Please provide me with the most elementary explanations for this recovery process. Super lament terms and instructions are extremely appreciated. Thanks. Les
creator: ldmpautocentre
